member.name: T:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem
member.summary: Represents a menu item described by an implementation. A menu item can describe child menu items.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Text
member.summary: The text to display with the menu item.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Id
member.summary: The html id of the menu item.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Href
member.summary: The final url that the menu item will link to. This property is computed based on or .

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Url
member.summary: The optional url the menu item should link to.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Position
member.summary: The relative position of the menu item among its siblings. e.g., 10, 0, "after".

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Priority
member.summary: The priority of the menu item in case there are other menu items that could be marked as selected for the request.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.LinkToFirstChild
member.summary: Whether the menu item should link to the same url as its first child.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.LocalNav
member.summary: True if the menu item is local to the page, like a tab.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Culture
member.summary: The culture for which this menu item is used.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Resource
member.summary: The resource the permission is protecting.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Items
member.summary: The child menu items.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.RouteValues
member.summary: The optional route values for this menu item.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Permissions
member.summary: The list of objects the user must have in order to see this menu item.

member.name: P:OrchardCore.Navigation.MenuItem.Classes
member.summary: The css classes to render with the menu item.

member.summary: Populates the menu shapes.

member.summary: Populates the menu shapes for the level recursively.

member.summary: Ensures only one menuitem (and its ancestors) are marked as selected for the menu.

member.summary: Traverses the menu and returns the selected item with the highest priority
